thread.title: Platini loses advisor
thread.title_full: Platini loses advisor | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: saudigazette.com.sa
title: Platini loses advisor
text:
ZURICH — European soccer chief Michel Platini has lost the services of one of his key advisers. UEFA said Thursday that Kevin Lamour, head of the president’s office was taking a leave of absence.
A UEFA spokesman said Lamour’s decision was “completely” unrelated to the Swiss investigation of Platini’s receipt in 2011 of a 2 million Swiss franc payment from Blatter.
While Lamour’s departure is unconnected to the investigation and the scrutiny of Platini, it leaves the Frenchman without a trusted advisor at a difficult time. — Reuters
